instructions.name: add_asset_pool
docs: [Governance] Adds a new asset pool to the market.

instructions.name: approve_delegation
docs: [User] Approves another account to borrow against their position.

instructions.name: borrow
docs: [User] Borrows assets against their deposited collateral.

instructions.name: borrow_delegated
docs: [Delegatee] Borrows using the credit line delegated to them.

instructions.name: collect_protocol_fees
docs: [Governance] Collects accrued protocol fees from an asset pool.

instructions.name: create_user_position
docs: [User] Initializes a user's position account for a specific asset pool.

instructions.name: deposit
docs: [User] Deposits assets into a pool to be used as collateral.

instructions.name: enable_withdraw_only_mode
docs: [Governance] Sets the protocol to withdraw-only mode.

instructions.name: execute_operations
docs: [User] Executes a batch of operations in a single transaction.

instructions.name: flash_loan
docs: [User/Bot] Executes a flash loan.

instructions.name: initialize_market_config
docs: [Governance] Initializes the central market configuration.

instructions.name: liquidate
docs: [Liquidator] Liquidates an unhealthy position by repaying debt to seize collateral.

instructions.name: pause_protocol
docs: [Governance] Pauses the protocol, halting most user interactions.

instructions.name: repay
docs: [User] Repays a loan to the asset pool.

instructions.name: revoke_delegation
docs: [User] Revokes an existing credit delegation.

instructions.name: unpause_protocol
docs: [Governance] Unpauses the protocol, resuming normal operations.

instructions.name: update_asset_pool
docs: [Governance] Updates the parameters for an existing asset pool.

instructions.name: update_governance_authority
docs: [Governance] Transfers governance authority to a new public key.

instructions.name: withdraw
docs: [User] Withdraws collateral from a pool, subject to health checks.

errors.name: MathOverflow
errors.msg: Mathematical overflow during calculation.

errors.name: InvalidPythAccount
errors.msg: Invalid Pyth account provided.

errors.name: PythPriceTooOld
errors.msg: The Pyth price feed is too old.

errors.name: PythConfidenceTooWide
errors.msg: The Pyth price confidence interval is too wide.

errors.name: ChainlinkPriceTooOld
errors.msg: The Chainlink price feed is too old.

errors.name: InvalidChainlinkPrice
errors.msg: Invalid Chainlink price (e.g., negative or zero).

errors.name: AllOraclesFailed
errors.msg: All available oracles failed to provide a valid price.

errors.name: InvalidPythPrice
errors.msg: The Pyth price is invalid (e.g., negative or zero).

errors.name: InsufficientCollateral
errors.msg: Collateral value is insufficient for this operation.

errors.name: InsufficientCollateralAmount
errors.msg: Not enough collateral deposited to withdraw this amount.

errors.name: PositionHealthy
errors.msg: The position is healthy and cannot be liquidated.

errors.name: PositionWouldBecomeUnhealthy
errors.msg: This operation would leave the position unhealthy.

errors.name: InvalidOwner
errors.msg: The signer is not the owner of the user position account.

errors.name: InsufficientCollateralForLiquidation
errors.msg: Not enough collateral in the position for the liquidation seizure.

errors.name: ZeroAmount
errors.msg: The transaction amount cannot be zero.

errors.name: MaxAssetsExceeded
errors.msg: The maximum number of asset pools has been reached.

errors.name: InsufficientLiquidity
errors.msg: The asset pool has insufficient liquidity for this operation.

errors.name: DelegationMismatch
errors.msg: The signer does not match the approved delegatee for this credit line.

errors.name: DelegationExceeded
errors.msg: The requested borrow amount exceeds the delegated credit line.

errors.name: InvalidOperation
errors.msg: The operation provided in the batch transaction is invalid.

errors.name: DelegationIsActive
errors.msg: The delegation is currently in use and cannot be revoked.

errors.name: FlashLoanNotAvailable
errors.msg: Flash loans are not enabled for this asset pool.

errors.name: FlashLoanReentrancy
errors.msg: Flash loan callback cannot be the lending program itself.

errors.name: FlashLoanRepaymentFailed
errors.msg: The flash loan was not fully repaid with the required fee.

errors.name: CollateralMintMismatch
errors.msg: The provided collateral mint account does not match the one in the collateral pool.

errors.name: LoanMintMismatch
errors.msg: The provided loan mint account does not match the one in the loan pool.

errors.name: ProtocolPaused
errors.msg: The protocol is currently paused by governance.

errors.name: ProtocolNotActive
errors.msg: The protocol is not active. No new positions or loans can be created.

errors.name: CannotLiquidateSelf
errors.msg: A liquidator cannot liquidate their own position.

errors.name: InvalidOracleAccount
errors.msg: The provided oracle account is not valid or recognized.

errors.name: InvalidLtv
errors.msg: Loan-to-value cannot be greater than the liquidation threshold.

errors.name: InvalidLiquidationThreshold
errors.msg: Liquidation threshold must be less than 100%.

errors.name: InvalidOptimalUtilization
errors.msg: Optimal utilization must be less than 100%.

errors.name: InvalidAssetVault
errors.msg: The provided asset vault account is invalid for this pool.

errors.name: InvalidAssetPool
errors.msg: The provided asset Pool account is invalid for this pool.

errors.name: InvalidAssetMint
errors.msg: The provided asset Mint account is invalid for this pool.

fields.name: status
docs: Protocol status: 0=Active, 1=Paused, 2=WithdrawOnly
